      • Region

        public Region​(int region_number,
              char operator,
              int target,
              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> values)
        Constructor with all data fields at parameters.
        Parameters:
        region_number - Region identifier.
        operator - + * - /, or ' ' for no operator.
        target - Target value.
        values - ArrayList of int values in the region, or null.

    • Method Detail

      • readFromGrid

        public static Region[] readFromGrid​(Grid grid)
        Given a Grid, read its region data into an Array of regions. Does NOT generate operators or targets.
        Parameters:
        grid - Grid to read from
        Returns:
        Array of regions with only values, no ops or targets.

      • generateOperatorAndTarget

        public void generateOperatorAndTarget()
        Randomly choose an operator and attempt to create a valid target (non- negative integer). If impossible, choose a different operator. If region is of size 1, use the ' ' operator. Note: the division operator appears much less than the others, as it is fairly uncommon for several random numbers to divide into an integer.

      • addValue

        public void addValue​(int v)
        Add a value to the list.
        Parameters:
        v - Value to add.
